attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Myself and many thousands of others have worked long and hard to make our homes comfortable, we pay for all our maintenance, and big raises on our mortgages, many of us do not have savings as any spare money goes on all the other taxes that are hidden.  I for one do not want snoopers in my home telling me I will have to pay more because of where I live and have a conservatory, and a nice kitchen etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
